projects.mainTitle: Town of Collbran – 250,000 Gallon Finished Water Storage Tank
mainContent: WestWater Engineering completed the planning, design, and construction oversight of a 250,000-gallon finished water storage tank.

The tank was a vital component to the Town’s water distribution system to provide redundancy since only one storage tank was previously located on the opposite side of Plateau Creek and was the Town’s only source of storage.

The above-ground welded steel storage tank is constructed such that the normal operating levels match levels in the original tank, allowing the new tank to “float” on the existing system and requires no level control system.
